 Apocalypse smiled. "All right." He sent up a link to
Drillbit. "Hello old friend. This is Apocalypse. I
wish to ask you a favor. We need your digging uses for
a mission against the trainers. The rest of your
soilders are not needed. But you are vital for this
plan to work."
--- Rudra656@... wrote:
> ::Cygnar::
>     "I have just the bot to stay here and help with
> that.  NeoGuile, step 
> forward."  
> 
> ::NeoGuile::
>     He steps forward silently.  "I understand.  I
> will work here."
> 
> ::Cygnar::
>     "Good.  Now, I suggest you find Drill Bit now
> Apocalypse.  It would be a 
> mistake to attempt blasting our way in.  Too many
> casualties are created that 
> way."
>
